readingKunHtml: ざ, じゃ, たわむ
sourceMeaningMnemonic: Throw a <radical>drunkard</radical> in a cage with a <radical>tiger</radical> and some <radical>spikes</radical> and the tiger will have the time of its life <kanji>play</kanji>ing with them! Think of all the tiger play time possibilities!
meaningInfo: If you were the tiger how would you play with the drunkard?
readingMnemonic: If you aren't the tiger, watching it <kanji>play</kanji> is a little like watching someone's head get cut off with a <reading>gui</reading>llotine (<ja>ぎ</ja>). In fact, you don't want to watch it play at all anymore.
readingInfo: What would you rather watch? A guillotine at work or a tiger playing like this?
